mapper.select: SELECT i.inNum, i.buyNum, r.whseCode, c.clientCompany, i.rawCode, r.rawName, i.inCount, s.stockCount, r.rawPrice, i.inPrice, DATE_FORMAT(i.inDate, '%Y-%m-d'), i.inEmpId, i.inState FROM inMaterial i left join rawMaterial r on i.rawCode = r.rawCode left join stock s on i.rawCode = s.rawCode left join clients c on i.clientCode = c.clientCode order by i.inNum desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT i.inNum, i.buyNum, r.whseCode, c.clientCompany, i.rawCode, r.rawName, i.inCount, s.stockCount, r.rawPrice, i.inPrice, DATE_FORMAT(i.inDate, '%Y-%m-d'),i.inEmpId, i.inState FROM inMaterial i left join rawMaterial r on i.rawCode = r.rawCode left join stock s on i.rawCode = s.rawCode left join clients c on i.clientCode = c.clientCode ) AS subquery
SELECT MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(inNum, 3) AS SIGNED)) AS max_num FROM inMaterial WHERE inNum LIKE CONCAT(#{code}, '%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inMaterial VALUES (#{inNum}, default, #{inCount}, #{rawCode},#{buyNum}, default, #{clientCode}, default, #{inState}, #{inPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT i.inNum, i.buyNum, r.whseCode, c.clientCompany, i.rawCode, r.rawName, i.inCount, s.stockCount, r.rawPrice, i.inPrice, DATE_FORMAT(i.inDate, '%Y-%m-d'), i.inEmpId, i.inState FROM inMaterial i left join rawMaterial r on i.rawCode = r.rawCode left join stock s on i.rawCode = s.rawCode left join clients c on i.clientCode = c.clientCode where inNum = #{inNum}
